items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
The Louvre Yu Nagaba

In the partnership which began with the Louvre in 2021, UNIQLO supports educational programs in the museum and releases collaborative products on an ongoing basis. For this new collection, selecting from among more than 35,000 pieces, artist Yu Nagaba has created special artwork of masterpieces such as Da Vinci's "Mona Lisa" and Vermeer's "Astronomer".

Yu Nagaba
Artist. Known for his works drawn with simple lines, he is active in various fields such as magazines, books, advertisements, and collaborations with apparel brands, in addition to his activities as an artist.

Inspired by The Astronomer / Johannes VERMEER / 1668
Muse du Louvre
2022 Yu Nagaba"
items.name: The Louvre UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: The Louvres masterpieces drawn by Japans contemporary artist Yu Nagaba are now available from UT!

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Monochrome Mickey Mouse Art by Joshua Vides

Southern California based artist Joshua Vides drew exclusive artworks for Uniqlo UT, featuring the most loved Disney character Mickey Mouse and his friends. Enjoy the new collection where Mickey Mouse and Art come together!

Joshua Vides
Joshua Vides is a Southern California based illustrator and visual artist. His work defines the premise of pop art through immersive installations and range of limited products. His latest concept, Reality to Idea, highlights the shape and form of objects through a Black & White comic-like perspective.

Disney
items.name: Monochrome Mickey UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Check out the new artistic UT collection for Mickey Mouse and his friends!

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Magnum Photos

From "Magnum Photos", the international photographers' collective established in 1947, we have selected works by photographers of various backgrounds which are reminiscent of visions of travel. Please enjoy the experience of thinking and dreaming of visiting a foreign city through these T-shirts.

Alec Soth
Born in Minneapolis, Minnesota in 1969, Alec Soth has been an exponent of the American tradition of on-the-road photography, critically acclaimed since he began his career. His works are in collection in major museums such as The San Francisco Museum of Modern Art and the Museum of Fine Arts, Houston. He established Little Brown Mushroom publishing company in 2008, known for its superb photobooks. He joined Magnum in 2004.

Alec Soth/Magnum Photos
items.name: Magnum Photos UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Magnum Photos, the world leading photographers' collective, is now available from UT!

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Magnum Photos

From "Magnum Photos", the international photographers' collective established in 1947, we have selected works by photographers of various backgrounds which are reminiscent of visions of travel. Please enjoy the experience of thinking and dreaming of visiting a foreign city through these T-shirts.

Alessandra Sanguinetti
Born in New York in 1968, Alessandra Sanguinetti lived in Argentina from 1970 to 2003. She was the recipient of numerous awards such as a Guggenheim Foundation Fellowship (2000) and the Fondation d'entreprise Herms / Aperture Foundation Fellowship (2015). In addition to The Museum of Modern Art in New York, The San Francisco Museum of Modern Art and the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, her works are kept in private collections. She joined Magnum in 2007.

Alessandra Sanguinetti/Magnum Photos
items.name: Magnum Photos UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Magnum Photos, the world leading photographers' collective, is now available from UT!
